error.missing_quantization: The GGUF quantization level {missing} does not exist in the provided HuggingFace repo. The following quantization levels were found: {available}
error.no_supported_ggufs: The provided HuggingFace repo does not contain any compatible GGUF files!
error.failed_to_connect: Failed to connect to the remote API: {exception}
error.missing_model_api: The selected model is not provided by this API. The available models have been populated in the dropdown.
error.missing_model_file: The provided file does not exist.
error.other_existing_local: Another model is already loaded locally. Please unload it or configure a remote model.
error.pip_wheel_error: Pip returned an error while installing the wheel! Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details.
error.sys_refresh_caching_enabled: System prompt refresh must be enabled for prompt caching to work!
error.missing_gbnf_file: The GBNF file was not found: {filename}
error.missing_icl_file: The in context learning example CSV file was not found: {filename}

progress.download: Please wait while the model is being downloaded from HuggingFace. This can take a few minutes.
progress.install_local_wheels: Please wait while Llama.cpp is installed...

local_model.description:
Please select a model to use.

**Models supported out of the box:**
1. [Home LLM](https://huggingface.co/collections/acon96/home-llm-6618762669211da33bb22c5a): Home 3B & Home 1B
2. Mistral: [Mistral 7B](https://huggingface.co/mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2) or [Mixtral 8x7B](https://huggingface.co/mistralai/Mixtral-8x7B-Instruct-v0.1)
3. Llama 3: [8B](https://huggingface.co/meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct) and [70B](https://huggingface.co/meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct)
local_model.title: Select Model

remote_model.description:
Provide the connection details to connect to the API that is hosting the model.

**Models supported out of the box:**
1. [Home LLM](https://huggingface.co/collections/acon96/home-llm-6618762669211da33bb22c5a): Home 3B & Home 1B
2. Mistral: [Mistral 7B](https://huggingface.co/mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2) or [Mixtral 8x7B](https://huggingface.co/mistralai/Mixtral-8x7B-Instruct-v0.1)
3. Llama 3: [8B](https://huggingface.co/meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct) and [70B](https://huggingface.co/meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct)
remote_model.title: Configure connection to remote API

pick_backend.description:
Select the backend for running the model. The options are:
1. Llama.cpp with a model from HuggingFace
2. Llama.cpp with a model stored on the disk
3. [text-generation-webui API](https://github.com/oobabooga/text-generation-webui)
4. Generic OpenAI API Compatible API
5. [llama-cpp-python Server](https://llama-cpp-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/server/)
6. [Ollama API](https://github.com/jmorganca/ollama/blob/main/docs/api.md)
pick_backend.title: Select Backend

data.max_new_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response
data.extra_attributes_to_expose: Additional attribute to expose in the context
data.remember_num_interactions: Number of past interactions to remember
data.in_context_examples_file: In context learning examples CSV filename
data.num_in_context_examples: Number of ICL examples to generate

data_description.llm_hass_api: Select 'Assist' if you want the model to be able to control devices. If you are using the Home-LLM v1, v2, or v3 model then select 'Home-LLM (v1-3)'
data_description.prompt: See [here](https://github.com/acon96/home-llm/blob/develop/docs/Model%20Prompting.md) for more information on model prompting.
data_description.in_context_examples: If you are using a model that is not specifically fine-tuned for use with this integration: enable this
data_description.remote_use_chat_endpoint: If this is enabled, then the integration will use the chat completion HTTP endpoint instead of the text completion one.
data_description.extra_attributes_to_expose: This is the list of Home Assistant 'attributes' that are exposed to the model. This limits how much information the model is able to see and answer questions on.
data_description.gbnf_grammar: Forces the model to output properly formatted responses. Ensure the file specified below exists in the integration directory.
data_description.prompt_caching: Prompt caching attempts to pre-process the prompt (house state) and cache the processing that needs to be done to understand the prompt. Enabling this will cause the model to re-process the prompt any time an entity state changes in the house, restricted by the interval below.

model_parameters.description:
Please configure the model according to how it should be prompted. There are many different options and selecting the correct ones for your model is essential to getting optimal performance. See [here](https://github.com/acon96/home-llm/blob/develop/docs/Backend%20Configuration.md) for more information about the options on this page.

**Some defaults may have been chosen for you based on the name of the selected model name or filename.** If you renamed a file or are using a fine-tuning of a supported model, then the defaults may not have been detected.
model_parameters.title: Configure the selected model
